children.subject: I think I got it: Practice problems (don’t turn in): [DPV] 6.2, 6.3, 6.4, 6.7, 6.8, 6.17, 6.18, 6.19, 6.20.
Also there are extra problems in 6.1 and 6.11 from what i saw after part 1 lecture. So you can add both of them to the Practice problems.
Where are "the practice problems posted on the website?"

Just a heads-up if you're coming to this pinned topic for the link to the office hours:

The YouTube link has changed, it's now: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysSBIpxum_0

(there's an unpinned post that also has the link)

The office hours session is recorded and would be available to view again on the link below:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysSBIpxum_0

We would also appreciate some feedback on ways to improve. Thank you everyone again.

history.content:
Hi everyone,

I will be holding my office hours session tomorrow 23rd August from 9PM to 10PM EST. The idea would be to discuss any questions that you might have regarding the online lectures on dynamic programming, the practice problems posted on the website or other DP questions. The office hours will be conducted via YouTube Live with questions submitted via a Q&A session in Google Docs. Also, note that this office hour session will be recorded and can be viewed later through the same link as below.

Link for the office hours: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2d3wJsaBTGQ

You can post your questions here: goo.gl/slides/3hpg7h

I will first answer the questions that are posted in the Q&A docs and then take further questions through the same Q&A session during the office hours. 

Thanks,

Murali
